page.title: 06EDUCATION
page.content: EDUCATION. A pre-school toddler's playgroup is held in the village hall,mornings only.St.John's C.E.First School caters for children between the ages of 5 and 8.It is an aided first school for about 90 boys and girls.The vicar,who is also Chairman of Governers,takes Assembly at school once a week.Other daily Assemblies are taken by the head and teachers.General education curriculum includes learning to read,language work,mathematics,art, craft and needlework as well as environmental studies,nature study and science.At the age of eight children have to travel out of the village to their next schools. Dancing teachers and music teachers give private lessons.Some dancing lessons take place in the village hall Piano lessons are in the teachers home
